author: cecilecaillol
body:
#### PR description:

Backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/38315 needed for Phase-2 L1 MC production

New LUT with tighter hwQual requirement for low pt muons (changes to the first PtBin only, gmtTkMuon Pt < 8 GeV)
title: [L1T] Backport: New low pt muon LUT
